short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for diving services for inspections and minor repairs in British Columbia.
description: This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) aims to award up to 5 (five) Standing Offers per each delivery zone as specified within the RFSO, to suppliers who can provide support to Small Craft Harbours with diving services such as inspection and minor repairs to meet program obligations with respect to maintaining safe and accessible facilities...
tags: Regional Standing Offer for Diving Services for Inspections and Minor Repairs
full_summary:
=================
### Regional Standing Offer for Diving Services in British Columbia

#### Solicitation Number and Contracting Entity
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is issuing a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for Diving Services in support of inspections and minor repairs for Small Craft Harbours across British Columbia. The solicitation number for this opportunity is 30003511, and the contracting entity is DFO.

#### Background
DFO requires a Standing Offer to support the Small Craft Harbours Program with diving services, including inspection and minor repair services. The selected suppliers will be required to provide support on an "as and when required" basis.

#### Scope of Work
DFO seeks to engage up to 5 (five) Standing Offers per delivery zone, as specified in the RFSO. The scope of work includes:

1. Inspection services
2. Minor maintenance services
3. And any other type of work required to be carried out depending on the characteristics of the structure to be inspected

#### Period of Standing Offer
The Standing Offer will be in effect for a period of up to 30 September 2028.

#### Security
There is no security requirement for this contract. Suppliers will not have access to sensitive information or assets, and will be escorted at all times while on DFO premises.

#### Trade Agreements
This requirement is subject to several trade agreements, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and others.

#### Mandatory Requirements
Bidders must meet the mandatory evaluation criteria, including providing a list of qualified divers with valid and current certifications. Suppliers must also demonstrate their ability to meet the scope of work requirements.

#### Regions of Opportunity
The Standing Offer is open to bidders across Canada, except for the following locations: Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, and Labrador. Suppliers will be responsible for any additional logistics or costs associated with serving these locations.

#### Exclusion
The Standing Offer is not subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements.

#### Tender Documents
Download the tender documents, including the RFSO, at the Canada Buys website.

Note: The original text has been edited to meet the 400-word limit while maintaining the essential information and details of the original document.
